name: High rate of 5xx responses
description: Checks for high percentage of 5xx responses

fields.name: content
fields.value:
a. Check your application logs and error rates for spikes in 5xx errors. If there are any spikes, investigate the root cause and fix the issues causing those errors.
   
   b. Review your load balancer's health checks and ensure that they are correctly configured to monitor the backend servers' availability and performance.
   
   c. Monitor your network traffic and ensure that there are no DDoS or other security attacks targeting your application.
   
   d. If the problem persists, contact IBM Support for further assistance.
